name: Cabbage Salad
ingredients: 2 Top Roman packages (chicken), smash into little pieces.
1/2 c. olive oil 1 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. red wine vinegar 1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. sugar 2 packages of Top Roman flavoring
steps: In a large fry pan melt 2 Tbsp of butter on low-­‐med heat. add Top Roman noodles and fry until noodles are
golden brown. Watch carefully. Once cooked put to the side.
Pour dressing on top of cabbage (let dressing soak in the cabbage for a little while if you can, in the fridge).
Then toss in the fried noodles right before you serve. You don't need to do this but it works well this way.
